methods.name: public Builder addFilterSchemas(@NonNull String... schemas)
methods.comment:
* Restricts an observer using this spec to triggering only for documents of one of the * provided schema types. * *

If unset, the observer will match documents of all types.

methods.name: public Builder addFilterSchemas(@NonNull Collection<String> schemas)
methods.comment:
* Restricts an observer using this spec to triggering only for documents of one of the * provided schema types. * *

If unset, the observer will match documents of all types.

methods.name: public ObserverSpec build()
methods.comment: Constructs a new {@link ObserverSpec} from the contents of this builder.
